name: iolib

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.build: npm i && npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.install: npm i --prefix client && npm i --prefix server
scripts.ubuntu-dev: npm run dev --prefix client & npm run dev --prefix server

author: vinit nagar
description: IOLIB a ai library based on RAG
